Item.comments: returns property field configuration. diabled, visible by state and identity
Item.method_code:
' arguments passed in are:
' <Item type="thisType" ' <state>currLCStatus</state> ' <form_name></form_name> ' </Item>
' RESULTS: Collection
' <Item type="Property Field Option" action="get" visible="1" disabled="1" visibleWith="otherProp" > ' <name>propName</name> ' <form_field_name formFieldType="type" >fieldName</form_field_name> ' </Item>
'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim thisItem As Item
Function Main() As Item Dim formName As String = Me.getProperty("form_name","") thisItem = Me.newItem("","") 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' fetch specific details of this item thisItem.loadAML("<Item type='" & Me.GetType() & "'" & _ " action='get' select='keyed_name,state,current_state,created_by_id,owned_by_id,managed_by_id,team_id'" & _ " serverEvents='0' doGetItem='0'><id>" & Me.getId() & "</id></Item>") thisItem = thisItem.apply() If thisItem.isError() Then Return Me
Dim LCstate As String = thisItem.getProperty("state","")
If LCstate = "" Or formName = "" Then Return inn.newResult("") ' do nothing
Dim fieldOptions As Item = getPropertyFieldConfigurationOfForm(formName, LCstate) If fieldOptions.getItemCount() <=0 Then Return inn.newResult("")
Dim result As Item = inn.newItem("Property Field Option","") result.setProperty("name","Dummy")
Dim sepChar As String = "," Dim visiblePropsList As String = ""
'loop Dim i As Integer For i=0 To fieldOptions.getItemCount() -1 Dim propName As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getPropertyItem("source_id").getPropertyAttribute("id","keyed_name","") Dim formFieldName As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("form_field_name","") Dim formFieldType As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("form_field_type","")
Dim isDiabled As String = "0" Dim isVisible As String = "1"
Dim enableForIdentity As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("enable_for_identity_id","") Dim visibleWithPropName As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("visible_with_property","") Dim visibleOption As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("form_field_visible_option","") Dim disableOption As String = fieldOptions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("form_field_disabled_option","")
If visibleOption = "hard_visible" Or visibleOption = "visible" Then isVisible = "1" If visibleOption = "hard_invisible" Or visibleOption = "invisible" Then isVisible = "0"
If visibleOption <> "" Then If isVisible="1" And (disableOption = "hard_disabled" Or disableOption = "disabled") Then isDiabled = "1" If isVisible="1" And (disableOption = "hard_enabled" Or disableOption = "enabled") Then isDiabled = "0" If isVisible="1" And (disableOption <> "hard_disabled" And isCurrUserInIdentity(thisItem, enableForIdentity)) Then isDiabled = "0" Else If disableOption = "hard_disabled" Or disableOption = "disabled" Then isDiabled = "1" If disableOption = "hard_enabled" Or disableOption = "enabled" Then isDiabled = "0" If disableOption <> "hard_disabled" And isCurrUserInIdentity(thisItem, enableForIdentity) Then isDiabled = "0" End If
' build results Dim tmpResult As Item = inn.newItem("Property Field Option","") tmpResult.setProperty("name",propName) tmpResult.setProperty("form_field_name",formFieldName) tmpResult.setPropertyAttribute("form_field_name","formFieldType",formFieldType)
If visibleWithPropName <> "" Then tmpResult.setAttribute("visibleWith",visibleWithPropName) End If tmpResult.setAttribute("visible",isVisible) tmpResult.setAttribute("disable",isDiabled)
result.appendItem(tmpResult)
If isVisible = "1" Then visiblePropsList = visiblePropsList & sepChar & propName sepChar= "," End If Next i
'loop again to update visiblity for visibleWith option 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim visibleWithProps As Item = result.getItemsByXPath("//Item[not(@visibleWith = '')]") For i=0 To visibleWithProps.getItemCount() -1 Dim visibleWithPropName As String = visibleWithProps.getItemByIndex(i).getAttribute("visibleWith","") If visiblePropsList <> "" Then If visiblePropsList.indexOf(visibleWithPropName) >=0 Then visibleWithProps.getItemByIndex(i).setAttribute("visible","1") End If End If visibleWithProps.getItemByIndex(i).removeAttribute("visibleWith") Next i
'remove dummy item result.removeItem(result.getItemByIndex(0))
Return result End Function
'--- Private Function getPropertyFieldConfigurationOfForm (formName As String, LCstate As String) As Item Dim aml As String = "<Item type='Property LC State Field Option' action='get' " & _ " select='source_id(name,source_id),form_name,enable_for_identity_id(keyed_name),life_cycle_state_id(name,label)," & _ " form_field_visible_option,visible_with_property,form_field_disabled_option,form_field_name,form_field_type'>" & _ " <life_cycle_state_id>" & _ " <Item type='Life Cycle State' action='get' select='id'>" & _ " <name>" & LCstate & "</name>" & _ " </Item>" & _ " </life_cycle_state_id>" & _ " <form_name>" & formName & "</form_name>" & _ " <or>" & _ " <form_name>" & formName & "</form_name>" & _ " </or>" & _ "</Item>"
Dim q As Item = inn.newItem("","") q.loadAML(aml)
Dim res As Item = q.apply()
Return res End Function
'--- Private Function isCurrUserInIdentity (ByRef thisItem As Item, identityId As String) As Boolean
'resolve the use of system identities Dim systemIdentityName As String = "" Select Case (identityId) 'Owner Case "538B300BB2A347F396C436E9EEE1976C" systemIdentityName="owned_by_id" 'Creator Case "8FE5430B42014D94AE83246F299D9CC4" systemIdentityName="created_by_id" 'Manager Case "9200A800443E4A5AAA80D0BCE5760307" systemIdentityName="managed_by_id" 'Team Case "275764859FDE49AF817571E8BFD8CBB5" systemIdentityName="team_id" End Select
If systemIdentityName <> "" Then identityId = thisItem.getProperty(systemIdentityName,"")
If identityId = "" Then Return False
If (CCO.Permissions.IdentityListHasId(Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.Current.IdentitiesList, identityId)) Then Return True Else Return False End If End Function
